name: CO2 Changes
description: CO2 PPM - Trends in Atmospheric Carbon Dioxide. Data are sourced from the US Government's Earth System Research Laboratory, Global Monitoring Division. Two main series are provided: the Mauna Loa series (which has the longest continuous series since 1958) and a Global Average series (a global average over marine surface sites).

name: CO2 Fossil by Nation
description: Per Country CO2 Emissions from fossil-fuels annually since 1751 till 2014.
